languages.text: If the noble and the servant are adjacent to each other at the start of the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they both gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>servant's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> or <u>noble's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus</u> depending on which is higher.
languages.original_text: Если аристократ и слуга в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} аристократа стоят на соседних клетках, они оба получают {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, равное <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g} слуги</u> или <u>бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g} аристократа</u> (используется тот бонус, который больше).

traits.locale_text: If the noble and the servant are adjacent to each other at the start of the noble's turn, they both gain temporary wounds equal to <u>servant's TGH bonus or noble's FEL bonus</u> depending on which is higher.

If the noble and the servant are adjacent to each other at the start of the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they both gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>servant's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> or <u>noble's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus</u> depending on which is higher.

If the noble and the servant are adjacent to each other at the start of the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they both gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>servant's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> or <u>noble's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus</u> depending on which is higher.

languages.text: Wenn der Adlige und der Diener sich zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Adligen nebeneinander befinden, erhalten beide {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} in Höhe des <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Dieners</u> oder des <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-Bonus des Adligen</u>; je nachdem, welcher Wert höher ist.
languages.original_text: If the noble and the servant are adjacent to each other at the start of the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they both gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>servant's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> or <u>noble's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus</u> depending on which is higher.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Adlige und der Diener sich zu Beginn des Zuges des Adligen nebeneinander befinden, erhalten beide temporäre Wunden in Höhe des <u>ZÄH-Bonus des Dieners oder des GEF-Bonus des Adligen</u>; je nachdem, welcher Wert höher ist.

languages.text: Si le noble et le serviteur se trouvent sur des cases adjacentes au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du noble, ils bénéficient tous deux d'un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} égal à <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}END{/g} du serviteur</u> ou <u>bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SOC{/g} du noble</u>, selon la valeur la plus élevée.
languages.original_text: If the noble and the servant are adjacent to each other at the start of the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they both gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>servant's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> or <u>noble's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus</u> depending on which is higher.

traits.locale_text: Si le noble et le serviteur se trouvent sur des cases adjacentes au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du noble, ils bénéficient tous deux d'un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} égal à <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}END{/g} du serviteur</u> ou <u>bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SOC{/g} du noble</u>, selon la valeur la plus élevée.

languages.text: 当贵族的回合{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}开始{/g}时，如果贵族与仆佣相邻，则两者都会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于<u>仆佣的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>或</u>贵族的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}加值</u>，两者取较高值。
languages.original_text: If the noble and the servant are adjacent to each other at the start of the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they both gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>servant's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> or <u>noble's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus</u> depending on which is higher.

traits.locale_text: 当贵族的回合开始时，如果贵族与仆佣相邻，则两者都会获得临时生命值，等同于<u>仆佣的坚韧加值或贵族的社交加值</u>（两者取较高值）。

languages.text: SI el noble y el sirviente están adyacentes al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del noble, ambos ganan {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} iguales a la <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} del sirviente</u> o la <u>bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} del noble</u>, usando el valor más alto de las dos.
languages.original_text: If the noble and the servant are adjacent to each other at the start of the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they both gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>servant's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> or <u>noble's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus</u> depending on which is higher.

traits.locale_text: SI el noble y el sirviente están adyacentes al principio del turno del noble, ambos ganan heridas temporales iguales a la <u>bonificación por RES del sirviente o la bonificación por EMP del noble</u>, usando el valor más alto de las dos.

languages.text: 貴族の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、貴族と従者が互いに隣接している場合、双方が<u>従者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>または<u>貴族の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}ボーナス</u>のうち、いずれか高い方に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: If the noble and the servant are adjacent to each other at the start of the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they both gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>servant's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> or <u>noble's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus</u> depending on which is higher.

traits.locale_text: 貴族のターン開始時、貴族と従者が互いに隣接している場合、双方が<u>従者のTGHボーナスまたは貴族のFELボーナス</u>のうち、いずれか高い方に等しい一時体力を得る。

languages.text: Если аристократ и слуга в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} аристократа стоят на соседних клетках, они оба получают {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, равное <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g} слуги</u> или <u>бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g} аристократа</u> (используется тот бонус, который больше).
languages.original_text: If the noble and the servant are adjacent to each other at the start of the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they both gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>servant's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> or <u>noble's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus</u> depending on which is higher.

traits.locale_text: Если аристократ и слуга в начале хода аристократа стоят на соседних клетках, они оба получают временное здоровье, равное <u>бонус ВЫН слуги или бонус ОБЩ аристократа</u> (используется тот бонус, который больше).

Если аристократ и слуга в начале хода аристократа стоят на соседних клетках, они оба получают временное здоровье, равное <u>бонус ВЫН слуги или бонус ОБЩ аристократа</u> (используется тот бонус, который больше).

languages.text: Soylunun {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında soylu ve hizmetkâr birbirlerine bitişik hücrelerdeyse ikisi de <u>hizmetkârın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}DAY{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}</u> veya <u>soylunun {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SYL{/g} bonusu</u> (hangisi yüksekse) kadar {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: If the noble and the servant are adjacent to each other at the start of the noble's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they both gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>servant's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> or <u>noble's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus</u> depending on which is higher.
